github.copilot.chat.commitMessageGenerat.text: Generate a commit message MUST following the Conventional Commits format (feat, fix, docs, build, ci, perf, refactor, test, chore).  Include a brief description of the change in the subject line (under 72 characters) and a summarized explanation in the body (under 200 characters), if necessary.  Separate the subject and body with a blank line.  Example: 'feat(feature): Add new feature description' or 'fix(bug): Fix a bug in the project'.
